price: ߦߊ߯ߟߊ߫ ߞߟߍ߬ߢߐ߲߰ߡߊ ߟߎ߫ ߖߊ߲߬ߖߏ߲ ߣߊ߬ ߘߴߌ ߡߊ߬ ߓߊ߬؟ ߕߎ߬ߡߊ ߡߍ߲ ߊ߬ߟߎ߫ ߦߟߍ߬ ߘߊ߫ ߛߙߐߙߐ ( ߞߏߞߏ ) ߟߊ߫
arabic: ۞ وَهَلۡ أَتَىٰكَ نَبَؤُاْ ٱلۡخَصۡمِ إِذۡ تَسَوَّرُواْ ٱلۡمِحۡرَابَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: wahal atāka naba-u al-khaṣmi idh tasawwarū al-miḥ'rāba
